Pre-Game Insights: Australia faces Pakistan in Match No. 18 of the ODI World Cup 2023 on October 20, 2023, at M. Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bangalore.
Australia has a good record of six wins in ten outings against Pakistan in World Cups, including the 1999 final at Lords.
David Warner needs nine fours to complete 700 fours in ODIs.
Hasan Ali is two wickets away from completing 100 ODI wickets.
Steven Smith is one six away from reaching 50 maximums in ODIs.
Adam Zampa requires three wickets to get to 150 wickets in one-day internationals.
Mohammad Rizwan is 59 runs short of reaching 2000 runs in ODI cricket.
Babar Azam is three catches away from completing 50 catches in ODIs.
David Warner requires nine fours to reach 2000 fours in international cricket.
Glenn Maxwell needs seven sixes to complete 250 maximums across formats.
Babar Azam requires four fours to get to 500 fours in the 50-overs format.
Marcus Stoinis is four sixes away from reaching 50 maximums in international matches.
